name: Symbi-Nautic (marikap)
description:
Separated from her ship, the explorer Axxi lands on an alien world full of symbiotic lifeforms, the Goopers! By combining with them, Axxi obtains new abilities, but only for so long!

Only with these symbiotes' help can she collect the broken ship parts and fix her ship!

---CONTROLS---

Movement: WSAD Jump: Space Camera: Mouse

Gooper Abilities:

Blue: -Increased Jump Height

Red: -Increased Speed -Dash on Left Click

Yellow: -Create Block on Left Click
